hero.title: Build the future with Claude AI
hero.subtitle: Join Rwanda's first Claude Builder Club. Learn AI development, collaborate on impactful projects, and be part of a vibrant community of innovators at University of Rwanda.

features.title: Building AI Solutions for Rwanda
features.subtitle: We bring together curious minds to explore, build, and deploy AI solutions that address real challenges in our community.

learn.title: Learn AI Development
learn.description: Master prompt engineering, Claude API integration, and build intelligent applications through hands-on workshops.

build.title: Build Real Projects
build.description: Work on meaningful projects that solve local challenges in healthcare, education, agriculture, and more.

connect.title: Connect & Grow
connect.description: Network with fellow builders, industry professionals, and Anthropic's global community of developers.

showcase.title: Showcase Your Work
showcase.description: Present your projects at demo days, hackathons, and gain recognition for your innovative solutions.

events.title: Join Our Next Session
events.subtitle: From workshops to hackathons, there's always something happening at CBC-UR.

projects.title: What We're Building
projects.subtitle: Explore innovative AI solutions created by our community members.

cta.title: Ready to Start Building?
cta.subtitle: Join Claude Builder Club and be part of Rwanda's AI innovation community. Whether you're a beginner or experienced developer, there's a place for you.

header.title: Empowering Rwanda's AI Builders
header.subtitle: Claude Builder Club at University of Rwanda is a student-led community dedicated to learning, building, and innovating with AI technology.

mission.title: Why We Exist
mission.description: We believe every student deserves access to cutting-edge AI education and the opportunity to build solutions that matter. Our mission is to create a supportive environment where curious minds can explore AI technology, develop practical skills, and create impact in their communities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading student AI community in East Africa, producing innovative solutions and skilled AI practitioners who drive positive change.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate students leading the charge in AI education and innovation.

timeline.title: How We Got Here
timeline.subtitle: From an idea to a thriving community of AI builders.

partners.title: Supported By
partners.subtitle: We're grateful to work with organizations that share our vision for AI education.

header.title: Learn, Build, Connect
header.subtitle: Join our workshops, hackathons, and meetups to level up your AI skills and connect with fellow builders.

empty.title: No events found
empty.description: Check back soon for upcoming events!

header.title: Join Claude Builder Club
header.subtitle: Start your AI journey with a community that supports you. Learn to build with Claude, collaborate on real projects, and shape the future of AI in Rwanda.

benefits.title: What You'll Get
benefits.description: As a CBC-UR member, you'll have access to resources, mentorship, and opportunities designed to help you become a confident AI builder.

form.title: Application Form
form.whyJoin: Why do you want to join?
form.whyJoinPlaceholder: Tell us what excites you about AI and what you hope to learn...
form.aiExperiencePlaceholder: Any experience with AI tools, programming, or related technologies...
form.disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to join our WhatsApp group and receive event updates.

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.description: Thank you for applying to Claude Builder Club! We'll review your application and get back to you within 48 hours with next steps.

validation.fullNameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.yearRequired: Please select your year of study
